<description><![CDATA[The World Health Organization (WHO) has begun a crisis meeting considering whether the explosive spread of the mosquito-borne Zika virus, which is linked to birth defects in the Americas, should be declared a global health emergency ]]></description>

<media:description><![CDATA[The World Health Organization (WHO) has begun a crisis meeting considering whether the explosive spread of the mosquito-borne Zika virus, which is linked to birth defects in the Americas, should be declared a global health emergency ]]></media:description>

<title><![CDATA[Be careful with domperidone, a drug that boosts a mother’s milk production]]></title>

<description><![CDATA[If a mother’s body is not producing enough milk, there should be a few steps taken before domperidone is prescribed]]></description>

<item>
<title><![CDATA[Video: CDC official discusses rise in emerging Zika virus]]></title>
<link>http://www.theglobeandmail.com/life/life-video/video-cdc-discusses-rise-in-emerging-zika-virus/article28294963/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[The CDC says there is growing concern about the emerging, mosquito-borne Zika virus after a surge in cases of a rare brain defect among babies in Brazil. Although cases of the Zika virus are still rare in the U.S., they're on the rise]]></description>
<media:content url="http://www.theglobeandmail.com/life/life-video/video-cdc-discusses-rise-in-emerging-zika-virus/article28294963/" bitrate="512" duration="129" medium="video" expression="full">
<media:title><![CDATA[Video: CDC official discusses rise in emerging Zika virus]]></media:title>
<media:description><![CDATA[The CDC says there is growing concern about the emerging, mosquito-borne Zika virus after a surge in cases of a rare brain defect among babies in Brazil. Although cases of the Zika virus are still rare in the U.S., they're on the rise]]></media:description>
<media:thumbnail url="http://static.theglobeandmail.ca/2d0/video/article28294962.ece/ALTERNATES/w460/CDC+Discusses+Rise+in+Emerging+Zika+Virus" width="460" height="259" />
